name: [GD] Detect Linux Discovery Commands Running within 24hr
description: Group command line (e.g. netcat + whoami + uname) and alert on combination within 24 hours.
query:
sequence with maxspan=24h
  [process where event.type in ("start", "process_started") and process.name:("*netcat", "*whoami", "*uname")]
  [process where event.type in ("start", "process_started") and process.name:("*netcat", "*whoami", "*uname")]
  [process where event.type in ("start", "process_started") and process.name:("*netcat", "*whoami", "*uname")]
